create.title: Role Request Created
create.description: You have created a role request. Wait for the admin to approve it.

errors.roleRequestAlreadyExists: You have already created a role request for this role.

accept.title: Role Request Accepted
accept.description: You have successfully accepted the role request. The user has been granted the ability to vote.

reject.title: Role Request Rejected
reject.description: You have successfully rejected the role request. The user has not been granted the ability to vote.

sendDescription: Are you sure you want to create a voter role request?
